sourcesContent:
<template>
    <node-view-wrapper class="radio-select">
            <v-radio-group v-model="row" row>
                <v-radio label="(양)" value="radio-1"></v-radio>
                <v-radio label="(음)" value="radio-2"></v-radio>
            </v-radio-group>
        <node-view-content class="editable" />
    </node-view-wrapper>
</template>

<script>
import { nodeViewProps, NodeViewWrapper } from '@tiptap/vue-2'
import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'

export default {
    components: {
        NodeViewWrapper,
    },

    data() {
        return {
            na: this.node.attrs.na,
            posId: uuidv4(),
            negId: uuidv4(),
        }
    },

    props: nodeViewProps,
}
</script>
<style lang="scss">
.radio-select {
    display: inline;
    margin-right: 0.5rem;
    padding-right: 0.5rem;
    border-right: 1px solid gray;
}

.v-input--selection-controls__ripple {
    padding: unset;
}

input[type="radio"]:first-child {
    // border-right: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87);
    // padding: 0 0.25rem;
    margin-right: 0.5em
}
</style>
